{"step_by_step_thinking": "Peau d'orange is a term used to describe skin that appears similar to the surface of an orange peel. This condition is often associated with breast cancer. According to Document [1], peau d'orange can be caused by cutaneous lymphatic edema, which causes swelling. This suggests that the condition is due to obstruction of lymphatic ducts.", "answer_choice": "B. Obstruction of lymphatic ducts."}
